meta.disclaimer: openFDA is a beta research project and not for clinical use. While we make every effort to ensure that data is accurate, you should assume all results are unvalidated.
openFDA is a beta research project and not for clinical use. While we make every effort to ensure that data is accurate, you should assume all results are unvalidated.

result.reason_for_recall: One lot of the 010-55-030, 6.5 mm Cancellous Bone Screw was recalled because a product complaint identified a mislabeling of the device.  Although the package label indicates Size 30mm, the screw dimension is actually 25mm.
result.distribution_pattern: Nationwide Distribution including AR, CA, FL, ID, OK, PA, TX, and UT.
result.product_description:
djo surgical Screw 6.5 mm, Sz 25mm, low profile.

Product is intended for the fixation of the acetabular shell or fracture repair
